channel.title: Turmoil-Rebirth || Old School ||
channel.description:
[center][b][u][size=18pt][shadow=red,left]Turmoil-Rebirth[/shadow][/size][/u][/b][/center]
[u][b][size=12pt]Objective[/size][/b][/u] Our objective for this server is to create a great looking server, and maintain good stability. Our main goal is to make a server that has virtually everything that use'd look for in a RSPS. By doing that we need to gather some underdog coders, to work together to make this all happen.
[u][b]Base[/b][/u] Hyperion
[size=12pt][u][b]Project Team[/b][/u][/size]
[ul][li]Venge Drop (Kyle)[/li] [li]Method_ (Syko)[/li] [li]Zzjimmy[/li][/ul]
[u][b]We do not wish to have anymore coders, so please do not ask.[/b][/u]
[size=12pt][u][b]Updates[/b][/u][/size] [code]December 2, 2011 -Started coding! -Changed base to Hyperion [/code]
[size=12pt][u][b]Pictures[/b][/u][/size] Coming soon!

item.title: Turmoil-Rebirth || Old School ||
item.dc:creator: @Method Method_
item.description:
@Method wrote:

[quote=“Loveandpower, post:5, topic:423904”][quote author=Method_ link=topic=526556.msg3835828#msg3835828 date=1322889638]
We might be switching our bases from Zepsity, to Hyperion.

Just a heads up everyone!
[/quote]A very wise choice good luck.[/quote]

Thanks.

And remember to keep this bumped!

Read full topic

item.title: Turmoil-Rebirth || Old School ||
item.dc:creator: @Venge_Drop Venge Drop
item.description:
@Venge_Drop wrote:

We will LoveandPower if you’ve never checked out Turmoil Rebirth the server i have now that im hosting then you will see why we are improving and upgrading for a base of zepsity still a PI but im sure many glitch’s bugs, and dupes to work out, havent reviewed it much yet but maybe it wont be too much of a pain in my ass to code in.

Read full topic

Our objective for this server is to create a great looking server, and maintain good stability. Our main goal is to make a server that has virtually everything that use’d look for in a RSPS. By doing that we need to gather some underdog coders, to work together to make this all happen.
